item.title: PHP Yay Preprocessor
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: Not enough preprocessor in your PHP: Hypertext Preprocessor? Enter YAY: YAY! is a high level parser combinator based PHP preprocessor that allows anyone to augment PHP with PHP I can see the strong temptation to use something like this. If carried too far though you essentially end up with the PHP equivalent of CoffeeScript.
item.content:encoded:
Not enough preprocessor in your PHP: Hypertext Preprocessor? Enter YAY:

YAY! is a high level parser combinator based PHP preprocessor that allows anyone to augment PHP with PHP

I can see the strong temptation to use something like this. If carried too far though you essentially end up with the PHP equivalent of CoffeeScript.
